weapon.Buff_GunFire_Flame_Resonance_Overseas_de: Flame Resonance: Increase flame ATK by 15% and flame resistance by 25%. Activate by equipping 2 or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_Level1_des: Each round of Barrage deals additional damage equal to ???% of the target's current HP (cannot exceed ???% of ATK).
weapon.Buff_GunFire_Level3_1_des: Deal flame damage equal to ???% of ATK every second for ??? seconds.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_Level3_des: Heavy Bombardment, dodge attack, and Close Quarters inflict Ion Scorch on targets that are already burned, dealing flame damage equal to ???% of their current ATK every second for ??? seconds.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_Level3_des_OS: Heavy Bombardment branch skill and Close Quarters dodge attack inflict Ion Scorch on targets that are already burned, dealing flame damage equal to 40% of ATK every second for 10 seconds.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_Level5_1_des: Deal flame damage equal to ???% of ATK every second for ??? seconds.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_Level5_des: The damage from Ion Scorch increases to ???% of ATK. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill will refresh the duration of Ion Scorch.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_Level5_des_OS: The damage from Ion Scorch increases to 60% of ATK. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill will refresh the duration of Ion Scorch.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_Level6_des: Barrage has a ???-second burn effect. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill reduce the cooldown of Barrage by 4 seconds. Effect cooldown: ??? seconds. The DoT from the dodge skill also triggers cooldown reduction.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_Level6_des_OS: Barrage has a 15-second burning effect. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill reduces the cooldown of Barrage by 4 seconds. The cooldown of the effect: 1.5 seconds. The DoT burn from the dodge skill also triggers a cooldown reduction effect.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_SSR_Level1_des: When equipped with 2 or more DPS-type weapons, deal an additional 10% final damage to targets with more than 50% HP. Take effect immediately and stack with multiple weapons. Effect is boosted when playing in a team.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_SSR_Level2_1_des: If Dodge Attack hits a target with Firearm Mark, restore 1 stack of dodge.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_SSR_Level2_des: The last hit of normal attacks applies a Firearm Mark on the target. Hitting the marked target with a Dodge attack restores 1 dodge attempt.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_SSR_Level4_des: Hitting a target with more than 60% HP has a 100% chance to apply a Firearm Mark.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_SSR_Level5_1_des: Increase flame damage dealt by 2% for each target hit, up to 20% in total. The effect lasts for 30 seconds.
weapon.Buff_GunFire_SSR_Level5_des: Increase flame damage dealt by 2% for each target hit, up to 20% in total. The effect lasts for 30 seconds.
